definition: to cup one's hands in salute/to surround/to arch/to dig earth with the snout/arched
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet

sentences.chinese: 渴望向上拱衛着神的寶座。

sentences.english: Green dragon protect thousands of miles of railway line, from east to west winds away.
sentences.chinese: 綠色巨龍拱衛中的千里鐵道線，自東向西蜿蜒而去。
